General.Name: Wendell Industrial Co. Ltd
General.Description: Wendell Industrial Co., Ltd provides circuit protection component in South Korea, Japan, Singapore, and China. The company offers MOSFET, diodes, rectifiers, circuit protection, modular products, and EMI components. It also provides turnkey, technical services, and other solutions. Its products are used in mobile phones, desktop computers, notebook computers, tablet computers, digital cameras, navigation systems, surveillance systems, industrial computers, medical equipment, communication equipment, Netcom products, wind power generation system, LED lighting system, and others. The company was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.188, Baoqiao Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23145
